üîß Hardening Checklist

  • Disable unused services matching affected products
  • Enable MFA on all admin interfaces exposed per Shodan data
  • Update WAF/IDS signatures for current KEV exploit patterns
  • Rotate credentials for affected vendor accounts immediately

üìä Metrics to Track
